This file contains ordered product names to use in the modelDocument.creationSoftware
result paired with patterns to search from by regex character matching, for example:
["abc", "ABC Corp"],  would replace the exact string ABC Corp with product abc
["def": "Drum Edwards Factory|D\s*E\s*F Corp"] would replace any of these
with Drum Edwards Factory, DEF Corp, D E F Corp, etc.
Regular expression back shashes must be doubled.  Note that XWand is last, so it
doesnt match products containing XWand in them.
